channel.title: How do I edit the bonuses on items?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to edit the item bonueses because I have a server and p'ring bonus is 0. Thanks if you can help out.

item.title: How do I edit the bonuses on items?
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

search for the item id…

delte whats there and paste this in…

item = 773 'perfect'_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 1469.99280576915 1469.99280576915 1760.58823743125 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000 5000000

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit the bonuses on items?

item.title: How do I edit the bonuses on items?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Item.cfg
Search ‘item = 773’
After that are 3 prices, then all the bonuses(should be 0s for you)

Read full topic
